content: Yellowbrow is a required Yaoguai King fight that you can encounter at the end of Chapter 3 in Black Myth Wukong. Located at the end of the New Thunderclap Temple, you'll have to defeat him twice in a drawn out battle to claim the Sage's Relic he guards.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
Yellowbrow is a required Yaoguai King fight that you can encounter at the end of Chapter 3 in Black Myth Wukong. Located at the end of the New Thunderclap Temple, you'll have to defeat him twice in a drawn out battle to claim the Sage's Relic he guards.
